prajananaya saha lingikathwaya kiyanne dekakya kiyala mama me lipi pela patan ganna kotama kiwwa.prajananaya kiyanne eelanga paramparawa bihi karana kriyawaliyata.namuth prajananaya kiyanne lingikathwaye ek pathikadak witharayi.minissu anith saththu wage nemeyi.awurudda purama lingikawa ekwenawa.ee wagema minisage usas buddhiya nisa ape sanwedi indriyayangen labena sanwedanayan thrupthimath karaganime hakiyawa labila thiyenawa.api kama kanne anith saththu wage nemeyi.honda rasa thiyena eewa thorala.rasa naththan rasa kara ganda api katayuthu karanawa.ape aaghrana sanwedanaya wenuwen suwanda wilawun pawichchi karanawa.sangithaya kiyanne shrawanaya pinawanna nipadawu kramayak.me wagema lingika kriyawath wadath thrupthimath deyak karaganda minisun pelambaila innawa.lingika ekwima thrupthimath deyak une naththan kawuruth lingikawa ek wena ekak nane.ee nisa parinamayen danata inna saththunta lingika kriyawa thrupthimath deyak bawata path wela thiyenawa.minissu wana api andum andimen, suwanda, rupa, aadiya bhawithayen me lingika kriyawa thawath warnawath karagena rasawath karagena innawa.

kiri gawayan ghathanaya kirima thahanam kirimata saha kiri gawayan aaraksha kirimata awashya piyawara ganima wadagath ki්rayawak.adu aadayamlabhi pawulwala daruwanta deshiya kiri labadimata da diri ganwimak washayen awurudu 1 sita awurudu 5 dakwa daruwan wenuwen rupiyal 200 masika dimanawak labadimata me ayawayen gena thibena piyawarath pa්rashansa kala yuthu ki්rayawak.deshiya nishpadanayata thana labadimath kabanika pohora yoda gowithana da nanwimatath yamkisi meheyak itukarannatath awasthawak udakara thibima da wadagath kota salakanawa.wishala wada kotasaka aarambhayata honda pasubimak lesa penwa denna puluwan.meya sama athinma honda ayawayak lesa handunwa dennata puluwan.uthure nawodayak da athi kirimata janadhipathithumage athi kamaththa ha unanduwa da ema janathawata athi lengathu bawada pa්rakasha kirimata owun amathimata demala basin da ethuma me ayawayedi katha kirimath pa්rashansaniyayi.swa shakthiya athi hamadenakutama nangi sitimatath me ayawayen piyawara gena thibenawa.
